title: Truth Check Collection
description: In this lab, we will dive into the world of JavaScript programming and explore various concepts and techniques used in web development. Through hands-on practice and exercises, you will learn how to write clean and efficient code, work with data structures, and create dynamic and interactive web pages. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced programmer, this lab will provide you with valuable skills and knowledge to take your coding abilities to the next level.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
